column4: no one else have issues where openoffice doesn't work in breezy?
OpenOffice opens very slowly at the moment, if you want to speed it up, disable Java
how do i disable java?  kill "java" from my path?

no, you need to tell OpenOffice not to use java when it runs. It does this by default, and disably it will disable a few features. I am not sure what you need to change to disable it, try searching on Google
